name: 허허허의 노예정신
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units

name: 결사적 방어
uniques: All healing effects doubled <in [your] tiles> <when below [15] HP>

name: 불사의 토템
uniques: [This Unit] heals [60] HP <[3] times> <upon losing at least [3] HP in a single attack>

name: 승전보 I
uniques: Heals [20] damage if it kills a unit
